mapper.insert: insert into Member(id, nickName, password, phoneNum, email) values(#{id}, #{nickName}, #{password}, #{phoneNum}, #{email})
mapper.delete: delete from FriendsList where memberId=#{memberId} and FriendsId=#{friendsId}
delete from BlackList where memberId=#{memberId} and blackId=#{blackId}
mapper.select: select count(friendsId) from FriendsList where memberId=#{memberId}
select nickName, statusMsg, profileImg from Member where id=#{memberId}
select nickName, statusMsg, profileImg from Member where id=#{memberId}
select memberId from BlackList where blackId=#{blackId}
